pullRequest.title: Add description for Tasks in job stat
pullRequest.bodyText:
Example:
ID: 1582304046978
Name: Compact
Description: CompactConfig{input=alluxio://SpeedcorePartitionedTable-masters-1:19998/catalog/movielens/tables/ratings_part/hive/rating=1.5, output=alluxio://SpeedcorePartitionedTable-masters-1:19998/catalog/mov...
Status: COMPLETED
Task 0
	Worker: SpeedcorePartitionedTable-workers-1
	Description: [CompactTask{inputs=[alluxio://SpeedcorePartitionedTable-masters-1:19998/catalog/movielens/tables/ratings_part/hive/rating=1.5/000004_0], output=alluxio://SpeedcorePartitionedTable-masters-1:19998/...	
	Status: COMPLETED

nodes.bodyText: can you add what the args can be?
